sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import { Container, Row, Col, Form, ListGroup } from "reactstrap"; import { useParams } from "react-router-dom"; import tourData from "../assets/data/tours"; import "./toursdetails.css"; import avatar from "../assets/images/avatar.jpg"; import Booking from "../components/Booking/Booking"; import Newsletter from "../shared/Newsletter"; const ToursDetails = () => { const { id } = useParams(); const {tour} = tourData.find(tour => tour.id === id); const { title, city, distance, address, price, maxGroupSize, desc, reviews, avgRating, photo, featured, } = tour; const options = { day: "numeric", month: "long", year: "numeric" }; return ( <>

{title}

{avgRating}{featured} {address}
{city} ${price}{" "} /per person {distance} k/m {maxGroupSize}
Description

{desc}

Reviews({reviews?.length}reviews)

{reviews?.map((review, index) => (
kathan

{new Date("01-18-2023").toLocaleDateString( "en-US", options )}

Amazing Tour
))}
); }; export default ToursDetails;
